meanings.definition: Special honor or respect shown publicly
meanings.sent1: The town paid homage to the brave firefighters who saved the school.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was an homage to nature's beauty.
meanings.sent3: The cat paid homage to its owner by bringing a dead mouse as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood tall, a silent homage to the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The monument was built as an everlasting homage to the fallen soldiers.

meanings.definition: A formal public acknowledgment of loyalty and respect
meanings.sent1: The ceremony was a grand homage to the retiring principal.
meanings.sent2: The king received homage from his loyal subjects during the coronation.
meanings.sent3: The robot malfunctioned and paid homage to the toaster instead of the king.
meanings.sent4: The flag flying high was a symbol of homage to the nation's unity.
meanings.sent5: The grand statue was a majestic homage to the country's history.
